thread.title: Protective to Host 2018 Company Update Meeting

author: cnbc.com
title: Protective to Host 2018 Company Update Meeting
text:
BIRMINGHAM, Ala.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Protective Life Corporation (“Protective”), a wholly owned U.S. subsidiary of Dai-ichi Life Holdings, Inc. (TSE:8750, “Dai-ichi”), will host a Company Update Meeting on April 12, 2018 from 9 to 11 a.m. CT, providing information about Protective’s 2017 financial results and current business strategy. Led by the Company’s senior management, the event is intended for professional investors, bankers, and other interested parties and will take place at Protective’s headquarters in Birmingham, Alabama.
A live audio webcast of the presentation will be available at Protective.com in the Financial Information section. Please access the website approximately fifteen minutes prior to the webcast to register, download any necessary software, and access the presentation materials.
A recording of the presentation will be available approximately 24 hours after the conclusion of the live event and can be found in the Financial Information section of Protective’s website through May 18, 2018.
ABOUT PROTECTIVE
Protective Life Corporation provides financial services through the production, distribution and administration of insurance and investment products throughout the U.S. The flagship subsidiary, Protective Life Insurance Company, was founded in 1907. Protective’s home office is located in Birmingham, Alabama. As of December 31, 2017 the Company had assets of approximately $79.6 billion. Protective Life Corporation is a wholly owned subsidiary of Dai-ichi Life Holdings, Inc. (TSE:8750, “Dai-ichi”).
For more information about Protective, please visit www.Protective.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180319005156/en/
Protective Life Corporation
Brittnie Bordonaro, 205-268-8611
